definition: to endure/to suffer/to be subjected to
to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)

sentences.english: Why did he let them suffer such cruel hardships?
sentences.chinese: 祂为何容让他们饱受如此残酷的虐待？

sentences.english: Growing up in a family of musicians, he was saturated with music at an early age.
sentences.chinese: 他在音乐世家长大，小时候就饱受音乐薰陶。

sentences.english: The mountain appreared barren, as though it had suffered through many years of arid climate.
sentences.chinese: 这座山看起来光秃秃的，似乎饱受了常年的干旱天气。

sentences.english: Fett's armor and body were extremely battered by his ordeal in the Sarlacc.
sentences.chinese: 在沙拉克中的煎熬使费特的盔甲和身躯都饱受摧残。

sentences.english: Seawater intake pipe-work systems always suffer the problems of fouling.
sentences.chinese: 海水管道系统经常饱受海洋生物污染的侵害。

sentences.english: I was able to meet the person buried under the clenches of her illness.
sentences.chinese: 我可以遇到这么一些饱受病魔折磨的人。

sentences.english: Before being liberated from slavery, these people had been scorned and used and treated as outcasts.
sentences.chinese: 以色列人脱离奴役前，饱受嘲弄利用，被视作贱民。

sentences.english: Europe was wracked by religious wars for several hundred years.
sentences.chinese: 欧洲就饱受宗教战争的摧残。

sentences.english: Aguirre is now the ruler of a group of slowly starving, hallucinating men.
sentences.chinese: 阿基尔现在成了一群饱受饥饿与幻觉困扰者的首领。

sentences.english: Since the outbreak of the financial crisis, Greenspan has been roundly criticized.
sentences.chinese: 金融海啸爆发以来，葛老饱受批评。

sentences.english: And art made tongue-tied by authority.
sentences.chinese: 学术结舌失语，饱受当局钳制。

sentences.english: The preparations for the summit, at any rate, have been unusually contentious.
sentences.chinese: 不管怎样，这次峰会的筹备工作还是饱受争议。

sentences.english: Subjected to torture and cruelty, Vosa succumbed to the dark side.
sentences.chinese: 饱受痛苦和折磨的沃萨终于向黑暗面屈服了。

sentences.english: Zhang Ziyi has been criticized for not replying to accusations of charity fraudleveled against her.
sentences.chinese: 章子怡因一直未对“诈捐”指责做出回应而饱受批评。

sentences.english: How can one haunted by madness be joyful?
sentences.chinese: 一个饱受疯癫折磨人如何才能喜悦？

sentences.english: The private army is under fire.
sentences.chinese: 这支私人军队正饱受抨击。

definition: to receive (praise, an education, punishment etc)/to be ...ed (praised, educated, punished etc)
to enjoy fully/to experience to the full over a long period
